subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Prudential Center (Newark)
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Drouin and Nathan MacKinnon are expected to go within the top five picks in the N.H.L. draft on June 30 at Prudential Center in Newark.
snippet: Jonathan Drouin and Nathan MacKinnon are expected to go within the top five picks in the N.H.L. draft on June 30 at Prudential Center in Newark.
